_sText:
Thanks for downloading aim_scopearena for Counterstrike Source

This map is based on a map i made for UT2004, its like the aim maps but has a buyzone , the spawn is a bit cramped , but u have to smash glass to get in the map
Recommended weapons are Sniper rifles , but any will do too be honest.

to install place the map to - [DRIVE]:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\[USERNAME]\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

Thanks Again , An Enjoy!

Author / Map maker BeNjI[uK*]

Email: benlaskey942@hotmail.com
